title: Audit for 'Shadow IT'
description: An IT auditor tries to identify instances of 'Shadow IT' - software or services used by departments without official IT approval.

tasks.description: Analyze expense reports to look for recurring payments to software vendors that are not on the IT department's list of approved applications.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies that the marketing department has been paying for a project management tool that was not approved by IT.

tasks.description: Review network traffic logs to identify data flows to and from known, unapproved cloud service providers.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review identifies significant traffic to a cloud file-sharing service that is not the company standard.

tasks.description: Report the instances of Shadow IT and recommend a clearer policy and process for requesting and approving new software.
tasks.expected_outcome: Findings are documented and recommendations are made to control Shadow IT.
